ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunting.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, absolutely. Never Selo s an invisible Dark Elf past the Halas Guards.  heheheh =) My song pulse (despite the fact that the DE was invis) still really
ygData.messageBody:
> aggressor and as soon as my song pulsed, the guards uttered that horrid
> statement about 'bards like you'. I fled instantly, but since I knew
> neither I nor my groupmate who wasn't even in the zone, had attacked the
> guards I feel sure some bug occurred. I /bugged it at the time. Has anyone
> else had similar things happen to them when their song radius might have
> included someone but did not actually affect them?

Yes, absolutely.

Never Selo's an invisible Dark Elf past the Halas Guards. heheheh =)

My song pulse (despite the fact that the DE was invis) still
really pisses off those guards and they are really good at chasing
you.

Harmonic.
